tileset = "underwater";
area = "lakequr_cave";
areaname = "Lake Qur - Lake Hag\'s Cave B1";
dungeon = "LakeQur";
ambience = {ra:20,rb:0,ga:60,gb:0,ba:80,bb:0,aa:100,ab:0};
A_sprites = [{name:"Shaft of Light",model:"examine",x:11,y:3,walkspeed:-1,conv:"c_lakeQur"},{name:"A",model:"area_transition",x:17,y:21,dir:"s",dest:["lakequr_cave2",17,22]},{name:"B",model:"area_transition",x:16,y:18,dir:"s",dest:["lakequr_cave2",16,19]},{name:"Exit",model:"area_transition",x:4,y:58,dir:"s",dest:["lakequr_under",19,3]}];
if(!GameData.plotVars.LAKEHAG_DEAD && GameData.CHAPTER == 2)
{
   A_sprites.push({name:"Lake Hag",model:"ch2bosses",x:11,y:11,walkspeed:-1,dir:"s",elem:"WATER",conv:"c_lakeQur"});
   A_sprites.push({name:"WALK_TRIGGER",model:"_trigger",x:11,y:15,ExecuteScript:function()
   {
      DO_ACTIONS([["WALK",0,-3],["UNFREEZE"],["TALK","c_lakeQur","Lake Hag"]],"PC",true);
   }});
}
areaLoot = [{x:1,y:25,type:"wepn",amount:1,item:"Iron Sword"},{x:1,y:41,type:"item",amount:1,item:"Potion"},{x:15,y:44,type:"item",amount:1,item:"Ether"}];
